description:
* A high-tech action series produced by http://anidb.net/cr735 [Gonzo].
The year is 20XX. Under the Maintenance of Public Order Act only a select few are permitted to carry firearms.
Tokyo has been converted, including major districts such as Shinjuku, Shibuya, Roppongi and Akihabara. Everyone now suffers a life of oppression and the constant threat of violence.
A mutual opposition in the underground plans to rebel against this malevolent syndicate. However, the people, and their names, as well as their occupations remain unknown.
The main female characters are http://anidb.net/ch10008 [Jou], http://anidb.net/ch10009 [Meg], http://anidb.net/ch10010 [Sei] and http://anidb.net/ch10007 [Amy]. These energetic and courageous teenagers with skills of professionals will deal with anyone who stands in their way — the gunfighter`s way.

REGULAR.description:
Kyouhei’s job hunt lands him in the middle of more action than he could’ve ever expected when he meets his beautiful new bosses: Sei, Amy, Meg, and Jo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Hölle kommt still und leise
地獄が静かにやって来る

REGULAR.description:
When Meg’s kidnapped by a mysterious Cybot, Jo and Kyo rush into the most dangerous part of town to set her free.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 情無用のガン・ファイター

REGULAR.description:
Random Cybots, RAPT, and a stealthy bounty hunter complicate the girls’ mission to bring in Wong.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La città dove ululano le bestie feroci
La ville où rugissent les bêtes

REGULAR.description:
Meg’s fighting for her life, thanks to a runaway freight train and a mutant monster gone berserk. A mysterious man from Wong’s past puts everything into sharper perspective.
Source: crunchyroll

Meg is undercover at an elite girls’ school, investigating a student’s descent into insanity - and some kind of demon is on the loose.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Schule, in der es vor Dämonen wimmelt
Il palazzo infestato dagli spiriti del male
Le manoir où grouillent les démons

REGULAR.description:
A secret society conjures an ancient demon and it has its sights set on Meg! If Jo can’t break the curse, Meg may not make it out of this mission alive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kono Hanazono o Chi de Arae
Lavate questo giardino con il sangue!
Lavez cette école dans le sang

REGULAR.description:
A giant bird snatches up Meg before Jo’s very eyes! A secret weapon injected into Kyo raises the stakes for Sei, and a deal to save Meg leaves Jo hanging in the balance.
Source: crunchyroll

Traps and cops are everywhere, but Jo and Kyo have to reach Tokyo Tower before the Crow Monster has its way with Meg.
Source: crunchyroll

The situation turns ugly after the announcement of Sei’s arranged marriage to a member of the Black Lotus Clan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: パーティ・オブ・ザ・ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
After Amy sneaks off to the electronics store with Kyo, they find themselves sucked into a world filled with cybernetic creatures determined to make them stay!
Source: crunchyroll

Jo’s protecting a star athlete, chasing a giant bug, and trying to save a hijacked train - all at the same time. Her hands are full, but a hotshot detective arrives and navigates the chaos with ease.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angel of the East, Hawk of the West
Engel des Ostens, Teufel des Westens
Higashi no Tenshi, Nishi no Taka
L`ange de l`est et le faucon de l`ouest

REGULAR.description:
Jo’s hauled in by an elite Hawk Squad Cop, and the city of Osaka is feeling the iron fist of RAPT. Meanwhile, Sei is digging deeper into the mystery behind the mutant creature.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La tour Tsutenkaku baignée de larmes

REGULAR.description:
With Meg held hostage, Sei finds her options limited when dealing with Iriki - any brash moves could spell a fatal end for her colleague.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Scontro sanguinoso! La gang di Naniwa
Un peuple se lève ! Combat sanglant !

REGULAR.description:
Flashback: Young Meg and her friends are homeless thieves, and they’ve caught the attention of a trained killer who will change Meg’s life forever.
Source: crunchyroll

The girls’ day at an amazing water park turns into a nightmare when a greedy park executive decides to sabotage the grand opening.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Ocean, Swimsuits, and a Sea Monster
Das Meer, Badeanzüge und ein Seeungeheuer
La mer, des maillots de bain et un monstre
Oceano, costumi da bagno e il grande mostro marino

REGULAR.description:
Jo’s suffering from painful visions, and she’s on the run after a routine Jango session leads to a violent attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il mondo misterioso del demone combattente
Un ogre vil tapi dans l`ombre
War Demon of the Haunted Realm

REGULAR.description:
A ghost from the past confronts Jo as she battles for her life, and a brilliant adversary from another dimension gives her a run for her money!
Source: crunchyroll

A simmering gang war pits brother against brother and man against machine. Kyo must prevent mayhem and save an old classmate from his own destruction.
Source: crunchyroll

Takane falls victim to a mind control device, and it’s up to the girls to rescue her from the clutches of the sinister men behind the mystery.
Source: crunchyroll

A new cybernetic police unit meant to keep the peace goes haywire and turns its malfunctioning glare to Takane!
Source: crunchyroll

Another terrorist attack rocks the city, but the girls won’t be saving Tokyo this time - they’ve been de-commissioned!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bullets in the Iron Grave Post
Tetsu no Bohyou ni Dangan o

REGULAR.description:
Cornered by a strange woman from Jo’s past, Meg finds herself in the clutches of evil. Glenford tightens his grip on Tokyo as dark clouds move in overhead!
Source: crunchyroll

It’s a battle between Angels when Maria and Jo face off in the ultimate fight of their lives.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Execution Ground on the Red Seas
Exécution sur une mer rouge de rouge
Il luogo dell`esecuzione sul rosso mare

REGULAR.description:
Sei devises a plan to free Tokyo from the dominating clutches of RAPT, but she’ll have to reassemble the team to pull it off.
Source: crunchyroll

6480.name: gun - TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED

titles.title: เทพธิดามหาประลัย
